mapper.select: select count(*) from member where MEM_ID=#{mem_id}
mapper.insert:
select count(*) from member where MEM_ID=#{mem_id}
insert into member(MEM_ID,M_PASSWD,M_NAME,M_EMAIL,M_PHONE,ZIPCODE,ADDRESS,M_JOB,ADDRESS2) values (#{mem_id},#{m_passwd},#{m_name},#{m_email},#{m_phone},#{zipcode},#{address},#{m_job},#{address2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where MEM_ID=#{mem_id} and M_PASSWD=#{m_passwd}
